Class TestGlider.Simulated_mouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • TestGlider.Simulated_mouse
  • Enclosing class:
    TestGlider

    public class TestGlider.Simulated_mouse
extends java.lang.Object
    A "simulated" mouse to have a slight input delay and limit, so the game is harder.
    Author:
    Chris Martin
